input.description:
String value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example: Netcool_OMNIbus, HP_NNM, BMC_Event_Manager

An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The event concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

output.description: XML output that contains results returned by the adapter request. The contents of the response will vary by adapter.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${field name}') = '0'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">OwnerUID</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${field name}</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <serial> <xsl:value-of select="string(//values/*[@name='Serial'])" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </serial> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${alert type}' = 'journal'"> <owner-id> <xsl:value-of select="//values/field[@name='OwnerUID']/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </owner-id> <field> <xsl:copy-of select="local-name(//values/*[local-name()!='Serial'and local-name()!='OwnerUID'])" /> </field> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//values/field[@name!='Serial' and @name!='OwnerUID']/text()" /> </value> <is-character>${is character value}</is-character> <alert-type>${alert type}</alert-type> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise /> </xsl:choose> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${alert type}' = 'alert'"> <field> <xsl:copy-of select="string(//values/*[@name!='Serial' and @name!='OwnerUID']/@name)" /> </field> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="string(//values/*[@name!='Serial' and @name!='OwnerUID'])" /> </value> <is-character>${is character value}</is-character> <alert-type>${alert type}</alert-type> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise /> </xsl:choose> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${alert type}' = 'uid'"> <field> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">OwnerUID</xsl:text> </field> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//values/field[@name='OwnerUID']/text()" /> </value> <is-character>${is character value}</is-character> <alert-type> <xsl:text>alert</xsl:text> </alert-type> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise /> </xsl:choose> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <alert-id> <xsl:value-of select="//serial/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </alert-id> <category> <xsl:value-of select="//category/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </category> <xsl:if test="string-length('${updated field}')!=0"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${updated field}')!=0 and '${updated field}' = 'severity'"> <operation> <xsl:value-of select="//operation/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </operation> <xsl:if test="//operation/text() = 'escalateAlert'"> <xsl:element name="${updated field}"> <xsl:value-of select="//${field}/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:element name="${updated field}"> <xsl:value-of select="//${field}/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:if> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <items> <item> <connection-parameters> <cell-name>${cell name}</cell-name> </connection-parameters> <arguments> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">ID</xsl:text> </name> <value>${serial}</value> </argument> </arguments> <xsl:if test="not(@name="")"> <update-arguments> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Category"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Category</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Category"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Host Class"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Host Class</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Host Class"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Component Type"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Component Type</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Component Type"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Time to Close"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Time to Close</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Time to Close"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Priority"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Priority</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Priority"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Occurred"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Occurred</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Occurred"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Location"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Location</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Location"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Host Address"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Host Address</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Host Address"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Host"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Host</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Host"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Notes"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Notes</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Notes"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Occurences"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Occurences</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Occurences"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Owner"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Owner</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Owner"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Service"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Service</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Service"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Severity"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Severity</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Severity"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Status"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Status</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Status"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Message"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Message</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Message"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> </update-arguments> </xsl:if> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow will update a given event.
